name: Frost Giant Skeleton
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Unusual Nature: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.Multiattack: The skeleton makes two greataxe attacks.
actions.Greataxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d6 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.Freezing Stare: The skeleton targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13+1d6 + 10 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
